containers.name: premium-ohlc-collection
command:
import asyncio
import aiohttp
import json
import logging

logging.basicConfig(level=logging.INFO)
logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)

async def trigger_collection():
    try:
        async with aiohttp.ClientSession() as session:
            logger.info("üöÄ Triggering premium OHLC collection...")
            
            # Call the unified OHLC collector endpoint
            async with session.post(
                'http://unified-ohlc-collector.crypto-collectors.svc.cluster.local:8010/collect',
                json={
                    'days': 30,
                    'force_update': False,
                    'use_premium': True
                }
            ) as response:
                if response.status == 200:
                    result = await response.json()
                    logger.info(f"‚úÖ Collection successful: {result}")
                else:
                    logger.error(f"‚ùå Collection failed: {response.status}")
                    
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"Error in collection job: {e}")

asyncio.run(trigger_collection())
